Name: Hoop Shot VR
About the game: Basketball like never before in VR! Shoot hoops and experience a whole new dimension of basketball in this quirky VR basketball game. See yourself in real time on the jumbo screen and experience the excitement as the crowd jumps at your amazing ball shooting skills. Practice and hone your talents on the court on the regulation basketball size court, score three pointers like never before. So jump in, relax and enjoy a game of basketball in VR. This game supports HTC Vive. Features Full Regulation Size Basket Ball Court Cheer Leaders Jumbo Screen Arcade Mode
